author: Linda Z
title: Always A Good Place with a Great Location
text: We chose the Hudson based on its location and its ease of access to Columbus Circle subway station. Rooms are always comfortable and clean. Staff always helpful. While we did not take advantage of the onsite bars/restaurant on this trip, we have enjoyed them in the past. Definitely coming back.
